mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Perkins, Benjamin
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Encloses a design for the new capitol for a column, which is to be called the Washington order; shows emblems of U.S., plenty, freedom, death, mourning; Is working on a "Mausolium" connected with a "Seminary of Education."; wishes his opinion on them; is a scholar of Daniel Trump of Philidelphia; Enclosed is a drawing of pilaster, dated Dec. 15, 1801.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1801 February 18, "Washington City," [D.C.], to Thomas Jefferson, "Washington City," [D.C.].
